## Bokashi paper
This file contains data from a study exploring the biochemical properties and efficacy of bokashi, a traditional fertilizer made from organic waste.  The drafted manuscript is a continuation of undergraduate thesis research published by Nisreen Abo-Sido on the Wellesley College archives of honors thesis.
